mapper.select: SELECT K.MARKET_NO , K.WRITER , K.TITLE , K.CONTENT , K.PRICE , K.ENROLL_DATE , K.EDIT_DATE , K.DELETE_YN , K.LOCATION_NO , L.LOCATION_NAME as locationName , M.NAME as writerName FROM MARKET K LEFT JOIN LOCATION L ON (K.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (K.WRITER = M.NO) WHERE K.DELETE_YN = 'N'
